dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service.session
Class SingleVMSessionHandler

java.lang.Object
  dk.itst.oiosaml.sp.service.session.SingleVMSessionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionHandler
public class SingleVMSessionHandler
extends Object
implements SessionHandler

Singleton implementation of a SessionHandler. Do not use this in a clustered environment, as it depends on static maps flor state sharing.

Author:
Joakim Recht

Parameters:
requestIdsCleanupDelay - Milliseconds to store assertion ids for replay prevention.

saveRequest

public String saveRequest(Request request)
Description copied from interface: SessionHandler
Save information about a request. The information saved can be retrieved later on using getRequest to replay the request after the user has been authenticated.

Specified by:
saveRequest in interface SessionHandler
Returns:
A unique opaque string, no more than 72 characters long.
